### Changed
- Convert app shell to New Frontend System hybrid mode.
- Migrate flux plugin to New Frontend System.
- Migrate ai-chat plugin to New Frontend System.
See [./docs/releases/v0.106.0-changelog.md](https://github.com/giantswarm/backstage/blob/main/docs/releases/v0.106.0-changelog.md) for more information.
